detail.content: Liquid-cooled 4-stroke in-line 4-cylinder engine.
Four valves per cylinder, double overhead camshafts.
Electronic fuel injection with ride-by-wire throttle system and sensor
Closed-loop 3-way catalytic converters.
EU-4 norm with electronically controlled interference pipe.
Air/liquid-cooled four stroke flat twin engine with balancer shaft
Four valves per cylinder, double overhead camshaft.
BMW Motorrad Telelever; stanchion diameter 37 mm, central spring
Dual disc brake, floating brake, diameter 305 mm, 4-piston calipers
31.7 ' (805 mm) Standard; low seat height 30.9'  (785 mm)
Available as accessory and/or factory option authorized BMW
75.2 (1,910 mm) Standard; low seat inner leg curve (inseam)
Single disc brake, diameter 270 mm, 2-piston floating caliper
CNC-milled, HP driver footrests, including gear and brake levers
High-strength aluminum alloy, light and extremely rigid
Detailed operating instructions for ergonomic settings
Driver and rear footrests with laser-engraved BMW Motorrad
Installation only by an authorized BMW Motorrad dealer
Capacity: approx. 35 l, big enough to accommodate 1 helmet
Waterproof and with lid finishers paint available in vehicle
Single key locking system for vehicle key possible
Optional: liner for topcase, backrest pad for topcase
Color: black/Ionic silver metallic
